text: attractions in Kathmandu-Kathmandu offers cultural and religious attractions including Pashupatinath Temple, Boudhanath Stupa, Swayambhunath, Patan Durbar Square, Bhaktapur Durbar Square, and Garden of Dreams.
attractions in Pokhara-Pokhara is known for Phewa Lake, Davis Falls, Gupteshwor Cave, World Peace Pagoda, Sarangkot sunrise viewpoint, and stunning views of the Annapurna mountain range.
attractions in Nagarkot-Nagarkot is a hill station near Kathmandu famous for panoramic sunrise and sunset views of the Himalayas, hiking trails, and peaceful nature surroundings.
attractions in Lumbini-Lumbini is the birthplace of Lord Buddha, featuring the Maya Devi Temple, Ashokan Pillar, monastic zones with temples built by various countries, and peaceful meditation areas.

attractions in Chitwan-Chitwan National Park offers jungle safaris, wildlife viewing including rhinos and tigers, canoeing on the Rapti River, and Tharu cultural experiences with local villages and dances.
